title: Teenage roofer who preyed on Somerset pensioners jailed
content: A teenage roofer has been jailed after targeting vulnerable pensioners around Somerset.Robert Small preyed on people aged in their 80s and 90s, despite receiving a warning from South Gloucestershire's trading standards team.Small was sentenced for his "mean" crimes to 14 months in a youth offenders' institute, after an 18-month investigation by police.The 18-year-old had been pulled in by trading standards in August 2013 after trying to get work in Downend and was warned by council of...
